constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 120 (Wednesday, July 20, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BACON:
H.R. 8438.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section VIII, Clause 3: ``Congress shall have
the power . . . to regulate commerce with foreign Nations . .
.''
[Page H6922]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: Foreign Terrorist Organization Designation Act of 2022
